text: Oreosaurus luctuosus, the lightbulb lizard, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Venezuela. ==References== Category:Oreosaurus Category:Reptiles of Venezuela Category:Endemic fauna of Venezuela Category:Reptiles described in 1863 Category:Taxa named by Wilhelm Peters Category:Taxa named by William W. Lamar
title: Oreosaurus luctuosus
